name: fastn-tryer
description: A little fastn app for trying out fastn in your browser

scripts.watch: watchify index.js -o index.browser.js -d & stylus -u nib -w style.styl -o style.css
scripts.build: browserify -g uglifyify index.js --noparse clone > index.browser.js & stylus -u nib style.styl -o style.css
